wikipedia_page.main:
Reece Joseph Staunton (born 10 December 2001) is a professional footballer who plays as a defender or defensive midfielder for Bradford City.
Born in England, he represents Ireland at youth international level.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players
List of Bradford City A.F.C. records and statistics
response: *Youngest player: 15 years 332 days – Reece Staunton v Rotherham United, 7 November 2017.
In September 2018 he stated that he wished to play more first-team football, and also praised young teammates Eliot Goldthorp and Reece Staunton.
